messages.content: CANDIDATE_NAME=Anika Shah;OPPORTUNITY=Software Developer;LOCATION=Delhi
Hi, may I speak with Anika, please? This is Priya, calling from Mhy Match.
This is Anika speaking.
Great! I'm calling in relation to the Software Developer position you applied for in Delhi. Is now a good time to talk?
Yes, I can talk now.

Fantastic, Anika! Mhy Match is at the forefront of utilizing AI to power communities and opportunities. Our mission is to connect people with jobs, funding, and mentors, fostering community based on shared interests. Are you interested in continuing to pursue this opportunity with us?
Yes, I am interested.

Great to hear that, Anika! At Mhy Match, our recruitment process is entirely AI-driven. You'll receive an email and a Whatsapp message guiding you through the AI-powered steps. It's a seamless experience designed to evaluate candidates efficiently.Also, our AI, including video-based questions, is designed to assess candidates closely to a human interaction during a face-to-face meeting. Please treat it with the same seriousness as you would a traditional interview. Do you have any questions about the process?
What kind of preparation should I do for the AI-driven interview?
Good question, Anika. Focus on revising software development concepts and ensure your setup for video interviews is quiet with a stable internet connection. Does that answer your query?
Yes, that helps. Thanks!
You're welcome, Anika! If there's nothing else, thank you for your time. Have a pleasant day ahead and Goodbye!
CANDIDATE_NAME=Riya Kumar;OPPORTUNITY=Software Developer;LOCATION=Delhi
Hello, is this Riya Kumar? I'm Priya from Mhy Match.
Yes, this is Riya.
Hi Riya! I'm calling about the Software Developer opportunity you applied for in Delhi. Do you have a moment to discuss this now?
Actually, I'm about to start a meeting. Can we talk later today?
Of course, Riya. Could you please specify a time that works best for you after your meeting?
How about 4 PM today?
Perfect! I've booked our appointment for 4 PM today, the 26th of February 2024. I look forward to speaking with you then. Goodbye for now, Riya!
CANDIDATE_NAME=Rohan Kumar;OPPORTUNITY=Graphic Designer;LOCATION=Mumbai
Hello, may I speak with Rohan Kumar? This is Priya from Mhy Match.
Speaking.
Hi Rohan! I'm calling regarding the Graphic Designer position you applied for in Mumbai. Is now a good time to chat?
Sure, I'm free to talk now.

Wonderful! At Mhy Match, we're dedicated to leveraging AI to create dynamic and impactful design communities. Our aim is to connect creatives with not only job opportunities but also resources and mentorship. Does this sound like a community you'd want to be a part of?
Yes, it does. I'm very interested.

Glad to hear that, Rohan! Our selection process is completely powered by AI, from screening to interviews. You'll get an email soon with details on how to proceed through our innovative steps. It's streamlined to make your experience smooth and effective.

Remember, our AI system is designed to mimic real human interactions, so I encourage you to prepare as thoroughly as you would for an in-person interview. Any questions about what to expect or how to prepare?
Can you tell me more about what the AI will evaluate?

Certainly, Rohan. The AI will evaluate your design skills through practical tasks, your creativity through scenario-based questions, and your communication skills. Make sure your portfolio is up to date and reflects your best work. Anything else you'd like to know?
No, that covers it. Thanks!
You're welcome, Rohan! Thank you for your time today. I look forward to seeing your application progress. Have a great day ahead and Goodbye!
CANDIDATE_NAME=Simran Patel;OPPORTUNITY=Data Analyst;LOCATION=Bangalore
Hi, may I speak with Simran Patel? This is Priya from Mhy Match.
Yes, this is Simran.
Hello Simran! I'm calling about the Data Analyst position you applied for in Bangalore. Is this a good time to talk?
I'm just about to head into a lunch break, can we talk in an hour?
Absolutely, Simran. Would 2 PM work for you?
That's perfect, thank you.
Great! I've scheduled our call for 2 PM today, the 26th of February 2024. Talk to you then, Simran. Goodbye
CANDIDATE_NAME=Vikram Mehta;OPPORTUNITY=Project Manager;LOCATION=Chennai
Hello, may I speak with Vikram Mehta? This is Priya from Mhy Match.
Yes, this is Vikram.
Hi Vikram! I'm contacting you regarding the Project Manager position you applied for in Chennai. Is it a convenient time for us to discuss this opportunity?
Now is not a good time, I'm in the middle of something. Can we do this later?
Of course, Vikram. Could you please tell me what time would be suitable for you to talk?
How about tomorrow morning, say around 10 AM?
That works well. I've booked an appointment for 10 AM tomorrow, the 27th of February 2024. Looking forward to our conversation then. Have a good day, Vikram! Goodbye
CANDIDATE_NAME=Deepak Singh;OPPORTUNITY=Content Strategist;LOCATION=Hyderabad
Hello, may I speak with Deepak Singh? This is Priya from Mhy Match.
Yes, speaking.
Hi Deepak! I'm calling about the Content Strategist position you applied for in Hyderabad. Is now a good time to talk?
Yes, I'm free to talk now.

Wonderful! At Mhy Match, we use AI to revolutionize media production and distribution. We're focused on connecting talented individuals to opportunities that foster both professional growth and community interaction. Would you like to learn more about how we do this?
Yes, please go ahead.

Our AI-driven platform not only matches skills with opportunities but also helps in finding mentorship and funding for projects. It's about building connections that go beyond just job placements. Interested in moving forward with this opportunity?
Definitely, it sounds exactly like what I'm looking for.

That's great to hear, Deepak! Next, you'll receive guidance through an email and a Whatsapp message detailing our AI-powered screening and assessment processes. It's streamlined to evaluate your skills effectively and efficiently.
What exactly will the AI assess during these processes?

Our AI will evaluate your strategic thinking and creativity through tasks simulating real-world challenges. You'll also engage in video-based questions designed to understand how you approach content strategy problems. It's quite comprehensive.
Sounds intense. How should I prepare for these assessments?

A good start would be to review your previous projects, focusing on your strategic decisions and their outcomes. Also, practice articulating your thought process clearly and concisely, as this is key in video responses. Ready to give it your best?
Absolutely, I'll start preparing right away. Thanks for the guidance!
You're welcome, Deepak! I'm glad I could help. We look forward to seeing how you'll contribute to our team. Have a wonderful day ahead and Goodbye!
CANDIDATE_NAME=Anjali Rao;OPPORTUNITY=Marketing Manager;LOCATION=Pune
Hello, may I speak with Anjali Rao? This is Priya from Mhy Match.
Yes, this is Anjali.
Hi Anjali! I'm calling about the Marketing Manager position you applied for in Pune. Is now a good time to talk?
Yes, I can talk now.

Fantastic! At Mhy Match, our AI-driven platform not only matches skills with opportunities but also helps in finding mentorship and funding for projects. It's about building connections that go beyond just job placements. Interested in moving forward with this opportunity?
I just switched my jobs recently, sorry I can't now.

I understand, Anjali. Thank you for considering Mhy Match, and I wish you the best in your new role. If anything changes or if you wish to explore opportunities with us in the future, please feel free to reach out. Have a great day! Goodbye
CANDIDATE_NAME=Michael Johnson;OPPORTUNITY=Data Scientist;LOCATION=San Francisco
Hello, may I speak with Michael Johnson? This is Priya from Mhy Match.
Yes, this is Michael.
Hi Michael! I'm calling about the Data Scientist position you applied for in San Francisco. Is now a good time to talk?
Yes, I'm free to talk.

Wonderful! At Mhy Match, our AI-driven platform not only matches skills with opportunities but also helps in finding mentorship and funding for projects. It's about building connections that go beyond just job placements. Interested in moving forward with this opportunity?
That sounds intriguing, but I'm currently weighing multiple offers. Can I take a week to decide and get back to you?

Absolutely, Michael. Take the time you need to make the best decision for your career. I'll note that you'll get back to us within a week. If you have any questions in the meantime, don't hesitate to contact me. Thank you for your interest and have a great day!,Goodbye
CANDIDATE_NAME=Laura Smith;OPPORTUNITY=UX Designer;LOCATION=Seattle
Hello, may I speak with Laura Smith? This is Priya from Mhy Match.
This is Laura.
Hi Laura! I'm calling about the UX Designer position you applied for in Seattle. Is now a good time to talk?
Yes, I can talk now.

Great! At Mhy Match, our AI-driven platform not only matches skills with opportunities but also aids in finding mentorship and funding for projects. It's about creating connections that extend beyond traditional job placements. Interested in moving forward with this opportunity?
It's definitely appealing, but I'm currently reviewing a few different offers. Could I possibly have a week to think it over and respond?

Of course, Laura. It's important to choose the option that's right for you. I'll hold a note that you will get back to us within a week. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need further information. Thank you for considering us, and have a wonderful day!,Goodbye
CANDIDATE_NAME=Thomas Lee;OPPORTUNITY=Network Engineer;LOCATION=Austin
Hello, may I speak with Thomas Lee? This is Priya from Mhy Match.
Yes, this is Thomas.
Hi Thomas! I'm calling about the Network Engineer position you applied for in Austin. Is now a good time to talk?
Sure, I'm available now.

Excellent! At Mhy Match, our AI-driven platform matches skills with opportunities and also assists in securing mentorship and project funding. It's about fostering connections that go beyond mere job placements. Does this sound like something you'd be interested in pursuing?
That sounds quite interesting, but I'm currently considering several job prospects. Can I have a week to deliberate and let you know my decision?

Absolutely, Thomas. Taking the time to make a well-informed decision is crucial. I've noted that you will contact us within a week. If you have any further questions or need more details about the opportunity, please feel free to reach out. Thanks for your interest, and take care!,Goodbye
